languages.text:
Жертве удается на мгновение скрыться от меня, нырнув на тесную улицу. Реактивный ускоритель в спине выпускает струю призрачно-голубого огня, и я продолжаю преследование. Ворвавшись следом на улицу, я вновь вижу ее.
Хорошая добыча. Просительница желала, чтобы я доставил Жертву к ней, но я решаю поступить иначе. Когда все будет кончено, я насажу тело Жертвы на шип, растущий из самого высокого шпиля, чтобы он свидетельствовал о моей победе.

The Prey manages to elude me for a moment by ducking into a crowded street. The jet booster on my back emits a stream of ghostly blue flame and I continue my pursuit. As I storm into the street, I see the Prey again.
This is a nice catch. The Petitioner wanted me to deliver the Prey to her, but I decide to do something different. When it is over, I will impale the body of the Prey on a spike protruding from the highest spire, so that it serves as testament to my victory.
languages.original_text:

traits.locale_text:
The Prey manages to elude me from for a moment by ducking into a crowded street. The jet booster on my back emits a stream of ghostly blue flame, and I continue my pursuit. As I burst into the street, I see the Prey again.
This is a fine game. The Petitioner wanted me to deliver the Prey to her, but I decide to do something different. When it is over, I will impale the body of the Prey on a spike protruding from the highest spire, so that it will serves as testament to my victory.

languages.text:
獲物は人通りの多い通りに飛び出し、束の間、私から逃れることに成功した。背中のジェット・ブースターが幽霊のような青い炎を放ち、追跡を続ける。通りに飛び出すと、再び獲物が現れた。
なかなかいい獲物だ。嘆願者は獲物を彼女の元に届けるよう望んでいたが、私は別の計画を思いついた。すべて終わったら、獲物の胴体を一番高い尖塔から突き出たトゲに突き刺し、勝利の証とするのだ。
languages.original_text:
The Prey manages to elude me for a moment by ducking into a crowded street. The jet booster on my back emits a stream of ghostly blue flame and I continue my pursuit. As I storm into the street, I see the Prey again.
This is a nice catch. The Petitioner wanted me to deliver the Prey to her, but I decide to do something different. When it is over, I will impale the body of the Prey on a spike protruding from the highest spire, so that it serves as testament to my victory.

獲物は人通りの多い通りに飛び出し、束の間、私から逃れることに成功した。背中のジェット・ブースターが幽霊のような青い炎を放ち、追跡を続ける。通りに飛び出すと、再び獲物が現れた。
なかなかいい獲物だ。嘆願者は獲物を彼女の元に届けるよう望んでいたが、私は別の計画を思いついた。すべて終わったら、獲物の胴体を一番高い尖塔から突き出たトゲに突き刺し、勝利の証とするのだ。

languages.text:
猎物逃到了拥挤的街道上，暂时躲过了我的视线。我继续追逐着猎物，后背上的喷气助推器喷射出了幽灵般的蓝色火焰。当我冲进街道时，我再次看到了猎物。
我突然有了个不错的点子。我的委托人打算让我把猎物交给她，但我决定做些新的事情。等这场狩猎结束之后，我打算将猎物的尸体挂在整个科摩罗最高的尖塔上，以这种方式证明我的胜利。
languages.original_text:
The Prey manages to elude me for a moment by ducking into a crowded street. The jet booster on my back emits a stream of ghostly blue flame and I continue my pursuit. As I storm into the street, I see the Prey again.
This is a nice catch. The Petitioner wanted me to deliver the Prey to her, but I decide to do something different. When it is over, I will impale the body of the Prey on a spike protruding from the highest spire, so that it serves as testament to my victory.

languages.text:
La presa consigue eludirme por un momento resguardándose en una calle abarrotada de gente. El propulsor que llevo en la espalda emite llamaradas azules fantasmagóricas y prosigo mi persecución. Al entrar en la calle, vuelvo a ver a la presa.
Es un buen objetivo. La solicitante quería que le entregara a la presa, pero decido hacer algo distinto. Cuando termine, empalaré su cuerpo en la aguja más alta, para que dé testimonio de mi victoria.
languages.original_text:
The Prey manages to elude me for a moment by ducking into a crowded street. The jet booster on my back emits a stream of ghostly blue flame and I continue my pursuit. As I storm into the street, I see the Prey again.
This is a nice catch. The Petitioner wanted me to deliver the Prey to her, but I decide to do something different. When it is over, I will impale the body of the Prey on a spike protruding from the highest spire, so that it serves as testament to my victory.

traits.locale_text:
La presa consigue eludirme por un momento infiltrándose en una calle abarrotada de gente. El propulsor que llevo en la espalda emite llamaradas azules fantasmagóricas y prosigo mi persecución. Al entrar en la calle, vuelvo a ver a la presa.

languages.text:
Es gelingt der Beute, mir einen Augenblick zu entwischen, indem sie in eine belebte Straße flieht. Der Jetbooster auf meinem Rücken speit gespenstisch blaue Flammen, und ich setze meine Verfolgungsjagd fort. Als ich in die Straße stürme, sehe ich die Beute wieder.
Das ist ein netter Fang. Die Bittstellerin wollte, dass ich ihr die Beute liefere, aber ich beschließe, etwas anderes zu tun. Wenn es vorbei ist, werde ich den Körper der Beute auf einem Pfahl aufspießen, der aus dem höchsten Turm ragt, als Denkmal zu Ehren meines Siegs.
languages.original_text:
The Prey manages to elude me for a moment by ducking into a crowded street. The jet booster on my back emits a stream of ghostly blue flame and I continue my pursuit. As I storm into the street, I see the Prey again.

traits.locale_text:
Es gelingt der Beute, mir einen Augenblick zu entwischen, indem sie in eine belebte Straße flüchtet. Der Jetbooster auf meinem Rücken speit gespenstisch blaue Flammen, und ich setze meine Verfolgungsjagd fort. Als ich in die Straße stürme, sehe ich die Beute wieder.
Das ist ein netter Fang. Die Bittstellerin wollte, dass ich ihr die Beute liefere, aber ich beschließe, etwas anderes zu tun Wenn es vorbei ist, werde ich den Körper der Beute auf einem Pfahl aufspießen, der aus dem höchsten Turm ragt, als Denkmal zu Ehren meines Siegs.

languages.text:
La proie parvient à se soustraire à ma vue en se faufilant dans les rues bondées. Le booster dans mon dos émet un jet de flammes bleues et je poursuis ma traque. Je fonce dans la rue et retrouve sa trace.
Belle prise. La requérante avait demandé à ce que la proie lui soit livrée, mais j'en décide autrement. Quand tout sera fini, j'empalerai le corps de la proie sur une pique que je planterai ensuite sur la plus haute des tours, afin que tous soient témoins de ma victoire.
languages.original_text:
The Prey manages to elude me for a moment by ducking into a crowded street. The jet booster on my back emits a stream of ghostly blue flame and I continue my pursuit. As I storm into the street, I see the Prey again.
This is a nice catch. The Petitioner wanted me to deliver the Prey to her, but I decide to do something different. When it is over, I will impale the body of the Prey on a spike protruding from the highest spire, so that it serves as testament to my victory.

languages.text:
Avım kalabalık bir yolda çömelerek bir anlığına onu gözden kaçırmama neden oluyor. Sırtımdaki jet itici, buğulu, mavi bir alev yayıyor ve takibimi sürdürüyorum. Yola fırlıyorum ve Av'ı tekrar görüyorum.
Bu iyi bir ganimet. Müracaatçı, Av'ı ona teslim etmemi istemiş olabilir ama ben farklı bir şey yapmaya karar veriyorum. Bu iş bittiğinde Av'ın cesedini, en yüksek kuleden çıkan kazıklardan birine saplayacağım ki zaferimin delili olsun.
languages.original_text:
The Prey manages to elude me for a moment by ducking into a crowded street. The jet booster on my back emits a stream of ghostly blue flame and I continue my pursuit. As I storm into the street, I see the Prey again.
This is a nice catch. The Petitioner wanted me to deliver the Prey to her, but I decide to do something different. When it is over, I will impale the body of the Prey on a spike protruding from the highest spire, so that it serves as testament to my victory.
